title: Vevo
summary: Vevo (/ˈviːvoʊ/ VEE-vo, an abbreviation for "Video evolution")[3] is an American multinational video hosting service, best known for providing music videos to YouTube. The service is also available as an app on selected smart TVs, digital video recorders, digital media players and streaming television services.[4] The service once offered a consumer mobile and tablet app, however this was shut down in May 2018 to allow the service to focus on its other platforms.[5]
